item.title: Mypost
item.author: alessandro.bresciani2016@gmail.com (Alessandro Bresciani)
item.description: Some content func NewDatabase(dsn string) (*sql.DB, error) { db, err := sql.Open("pgx", dsn) if err != nil { return nil, err } if err = db.Ping(); err != nil { return nil, err } return db, nil }
